alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 11:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 1230 AM MST... At 1144 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Wenden, or 21 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alamo State Park, Buckskin Mountain Park, Parker Dam, Wenden and Salome. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 69 and 74. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 39 and 44. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 154 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
